Discover Chandrabadni Homestay

Chandrabadni Homestay is nestled in a serene village surrounded by lush green hills and dense oak forests, located at the foothills of the sacred Chandrabadni Temple in Tehri, Uttarakhand. The Homestay is conveniently situated just 400‚Äì500 meters from the main highway, accessible through the heart of the village.

Far away from commercial crowds, Chandrabadni Homestay offers a rare combination of spirituality, nature, adventure, and authentic village life. It is an ideal destination for travelers seeking peace, slow travel, and meaningful experiences.

Meet Our Team

We are three local professionals promoting sustainable rural tourism and self-employment. Our vision is to create employment for 50+ local people by 2026 and encourage reverse migration.
